accountingSystem.sendingFailed: An error occurred in the Accounting. No report to accounting took place.

warrantySystem.sendingFailed: An error occurred in the interface to the warranty system. No report to the warranty system  took place.

accountingConfiguration.failed: An error occurred in the Accounting interface. No report to accounting took place. (Reason: {0})

isisSystem.sendingFailed: An error occurred in the interface to the E-Invoice-Middleware (ISIS-System). No report to the E-Invoice-Middleware took place.

iucca.unknownUser: Current User ID in system not known  anymore
